Question about `ModelingToolkit` and `Symbolics` : I’m trying to take the limit of an expression involving special functions and their derivatives.
I figured that `SymbolicUtils.@rule`  was the way to go. However, the limit is different depending on of the arguments (e.g. lim d-> 0 bessel( nu, k) depends on nu).

I tried this
```using SymbolicUtils._iszero
SymbolicUtils.@rule besselk(~ν,~τ) => SymbolicUtils.ifelse(~ν::_iszero, -log(τ), gamma(~ν)*^((1/2*~τ),-1*~ν) )```
but doesn’t work and I can’t figure it out
